1.content:
Welcome to Giants: A story where giants roam for good or for bad!
The world of Giants is called Gaia, it is much like our own world only less poluted, there are cities but they are smaller and the planet is less densely populated (However there is still plently of room for destruction if you so choose)
The story is set a few hundred years in the future so things are advanced but not drastically so (So no hovercars!) Before you begin you need to choose a character to play as and to do that you need to answer some questions about your character, so let's start:
Firstly, How old is your character?

White

Personality: Makil is similar to average humans on the outside. However, he has supernatural powers that he can use against the demons.

Play as Makil?
131211.title: Character 1

1312111.content:
Makil was travelling to a new school. He had partially wrecked the last one (though no one except his friend knew it). Due to circumstances not to be explained here, he had been forced to fight two Class 4 demons and a warlock on campus. Thus he was being transferred to Ichigo Masuchi High, Maus Falls, Missouri.

Makil's one close friend, Jack, was also his boyfriend. Jack also knew a slight bit of Syu, and he and Makil were undergoing training from a mysterious white-robed stranger.

As Makil sat next to Jack, he glanced around, then whispered a few Angelic words and summoned a ball of light to his hand, then quickly vanquished it as Jack looked over.

Jack smiled and grasped Makil's hand firmly. Slowly, they drew together. Makil wrapped his arms around Jake in a big hug.
1312111.title: Introduction: Makil

13121111.content: Once class was over, Makil headed over to the dojo. He entered the locker area and opened his bamboo locker. He took out his sparring clothes and began undressing himself. He took off his boxers and stuffed his clothes into a pouch in his locker. He bent over to get his sparring outfit...
13121111.title: Surprise

131222.title: Character

choices: A Black haired guy near the back of the class
1312221.content:
Simon sat gazing out of the window. His friend was busily talking but he was paying her little attention. They were driving to a new school, in a new city. They both lived together since neither of them had parents and, Slash (whose real name was Sasha) was also a demon.
They had to leave their old city behind after demon hunters began to show up and Simon hated relocating almost constantly. He needed companionship and Sasha, a good friend though she was just couldn't provide the affection he craved.
He was hoping to meet someone at their new school, but the chances were minimal; once his potential boyfriend found out what he was he would run a mile.
Simon sighed as he watched couples walking arm in arm through the park.
Sasha sensed he was upset and tried to cheer him up.
"You'll find someone." Sasha said cheerfully.
"Hopefully." Simon said sighing again.
*
Sasha and Simon entered their English class, everyone else was already seated when they arrived. Miss Glover the teacher stood up and welcomed them and told them to choose where they wanted to sit.
Simon and Sasha scanned the room, but they're weren't two empty seats next to each other.
Sasha eventually sat beside a blonde haired cheerleader. Leaving Simon with only two choices:
1312221.title: First Day

13122212.content:
Simon sat next to the jock and Miss Glover began the lesson. She read them a few chapters of "To kill a mockingbird" and told them to make notes in their books.
Simon dug into his bag and pulled out a notebook, then turned to see what the jock was doing, he had taken out a notebook covered in:
13122212.title: The jock

131222121.content:
Simon opened his eyes wide noticing some doodles on the jock's notebook. He tried to take a closer look and saw that he was right. This guy had a bunch of demons of different sizes and shapes all over his notebook. He even saw what seemed to be a five points start with some symbols written on it, which was used to submit a demon!

He blinked , could this guy really like demons that much?

He looked at the guy and saw that he was quite cute too but just before he could continue daydreaming....
131222121.title: Demon doodles

131222122.content:
Just Simon's luck the jock is straight, mentally sighing he wrote down some boring info about the book until the end of the lesson.
"Hey." Sasha said at the end of class, "This is Emma I sit next to her."
Simon eyed the blonde cheerleader somewhat distatsefully, she seemed to be a complete bimbo but Simon decided to give her the the benifit of the doubt.
"Hey." Simon said cheerily shaking her hand.
"Hey." Emma said hyperactively.
The three of them began walking down the corridor.
"So what have you got now?" Sasha asked.
Simon pulled out his timetable and looked at his next class.
131222122.title: Emma

1312221222.content:
"Pe." Simon replied.
"I've got Math, see you later OK." Sasha said hugging him briefly before running off.
Simon entered the changing room and was instatntly confronted by...
1312221222.title: PE

choices: ...The Jock from English was pretty cute."
13122212221.content:
Simon looked directly into the teacher's piercing gaze. He was as tall as the teacher who was quite good looking. He had black hair, though the front was turning slightly silver, green eyes and lightly tanned skin.
"Why are you late?" The teacher asked in a scottish accent.
"Am I late?" Simon asked.
"You are five minutes late and call me Sir when you talk to me."
"Sorry Sir. I'm new."
The teacher's expression softened slightly.
"Well OK, if you're new, but hurry up and get changed and don't be late again."
Simon quickly changed and hurried into the Sports Hall.
The lesson was quite fun, though Simon found it hard to concentrate, he kept staring over the Mr. Duthie (Which was the teacher's name)
He met up with Sasha after school later that day and they both got into Sasha's car.
"Meet anyone you like?" Sasha asked.
"Well...
13122212221.title: The Teacher

info.brief_description: A growing/shrinking story where you are in complete control.
info.description:
A gay giant story. I don't mind anything other than racist, sexist or homophobic material. WARNING: Due to the fact I allow anything (Unless it's agaisnt the law eg. paedophiles.) There will be a lot of content which may disturb some people.
Also certain parts of this story include Demons and Angels.
